Select One or More Version Labels

Use the Select One or More Version Labels dialog box to select one or more version labels for filtering your view. By default, commas (,) are used to separate version labels when you specify more than one version label in a filter. However, in order to filter on version labels that contain commas, you must specify a different character as a separator. All versioned files with the version labels selected will display in the File pane.

Field Descriptions

File list If a project, project database, or folder was previously selected, expand the tree to display files and select one. If a versioned file was previously selected, the selected file displays.
Version Label/Revision column Select one or more version labels for filtering your view in the File pane.
